description:
My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. Cozy 1 bedroom less than a block from the Kosciuszko J train and 0.5 miles from the Myrtle Av M trains. Memory foam queen size bed, chaise lounge for reading, dining room table that can double as a desk, fire escape and rooftop access. Cook with full set of pots & pans, toaster, and gas stove.

Guests staying longer than two days must be willing to help water plants :)
name: Jungle studio with fire escape + rooftop access!
review: The place was absolutely beautiful and quaint, I'm an artist too so I was able to appreciate every little thing that was around me.  Also, who needs a tv when  you've got awesome records! Thanks for letting us stay so short notice and keep up the good work.
